hadiths.text: Makhramah narrated that his father said:"I heard Mahmud bin Labid say: 'The Messenger of Allah was told about a man who had divorced his wife with three simultaneous divorces. He stood up angrily and said: Is the Book of Allah being toyed with while I am still among you? Then a man stood up and said: 'O Messenger of Allah, shall I kill him?

chapter.ara-name: باب الثَّلاَثِ الْمَجْمُوعَةِ وَمَا فِيهِ مِنَ التَّغْلِيظِ
chapter.eng-name: Three Simultaneous Divorces And A Stern Warning Against That
